meanings.definition: To support the weight of something and move it from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: I carry the heavy box to the car.
meanings.sent2: She carries her backpack to school every day.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ant carry the leaf on its back?
meanings.sent4: Her determination carries her through difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The crane carries the load effortlessly.

meanings.definition: To have something with you as you go from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: He likes to carry his favorite book wherever he goes.
meanings.sent2: Do you always carry an umbrella in your bag?
meanings.sent3: The squirrel carries nuts in its cheeks for later.
meanings.sent4: Her smile carries a sense of warmth wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers carries memories of spring.

meanings.definition: To transport or convey something from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The truck will carry the goods to the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The river carries debris downstream after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The wind can carry the sound of laughter for miles.
meanings.sent4: His words carry a message of hope to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The current carries the boat gently along the stream.

meanings.definition: To hold or support something while moving it.
meanings.sent1: Please carry the vase carefully to the table.
meanings.sent2: She carries the tray of drinks without spilling any.
meanings.sent3: The cat carries her kittens one by one to a new hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: His steady hands carry the fragile glassware safely.
meanings.sent5: The basket carries the weight of the fruits without breaking.

meanings.definition: To have a particular quality or feature.
meanings.sent1: His stories always carry a sense of adventure.
meanings.sent2: The painting carries a feeling of tranquility.
meanings.sent3: The song carries a catchy tune that sticks in your head.
meanings.sent4: Her dress carries an elegant design that catches everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The dish carries a unique blend of flavors that surprise the taste buds.
